name: Ankle Support
descr: The ankle facilitates movement when walking and running. At the same time, it bears the entire burden of the body. All parts of the ankle are put at risk. The highest risk of injury is borne by the lateral collateral ligaments. The Chiroform Ankle Supports helps with acute and chronic joint pain and is recommended as a preventive measure for weak and overused ligaments. Suitable for all-day and long-term use. Can by used for both right and left foot. Particularly thin fabric, may be worn comfortably in shoe. Light compression of 20-25 mmHG.
